attributes.action: regulate phone-in quiz tv channels and their extortionate prices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lets see an end to all the quiz TV channels that set the easiest of questions. They attract a high volume of callers who are charged £1 for each call, even if not selected to participate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
